description: Inhabitant Roster UI - Comprehensive view of all owned inhabitants showing stats, assignments, filtering by status, detailed info view, and reassignment from the roster.

userStories.title: Create roster list component with stats and assignment display
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see a scrollable list of all my inhabitants with their stats and assignment status.
acceptanceCriteria: A RosterComponent (standalone, OnPush) displays a scrollable list of all owned inhabitants
Each entry shows: name, type icon, tier badge, current state (normal/scared/hungry)
Each entry shows key stats compactly: HP, Attack, Defense, Speed, Worker Efficiency
Traits shown as small badges/tags; stat values above average highlighted in green
Each entry shows assigned room name or 'Unassigned'; unassigned inhabitants visually distinct
List updates reactively using @for with track by instanceId
Empty state: 'No inhabitants yet. Visit the altar to recruit.'
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: PanelRosterComponent with scrollable list, tier badges, state badges, compact stats row, trait badges, and room assignment display. Empty state shows altar recruitment message.

userStories.title: Implement roster filtering by assignment status
userStories.description: As a player, I want to filter the roster by assigned/unassigned so that I can quickly find available inhabitants.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter buttons/tabs: 'All', 'Assigned', 'Unassigned'
Filtering updates the list immediately via computed() signal
Filter shows count for each category (e.g., 'All (12)', 'Assigned (8)', 'Unassigned (4)')
Default filter is 'All'
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Three filter tabs (All/Assigned/Idle) with counts. Uses signal for active filter and computed for filtered entries. Default is All.

userStories.title: Implement inhabitant detail view with reassignment
userStories.description: As a player, I want to click an inhabitant to see full details and reassign them directly from the roster.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a roster entry opens a detail panel/modal
Detail shows: full name, type, tier, all stats with labels, all traits with descriptions, current state, current assignment
A 'Reassign' button shows a list of rooms with available slots; clicking assigns the inhabitant
An 'Unassign' button appears if currently assigned
Rooms at max capacity shown but disabled in the reassignment list
Assignment updates both roster display and room production
Escape or clicking outside closes the detail view
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Detail panel below the roster list with full stats grid, trait descriptions, unassign button, and room reassignment list. Rooms at capacity are shown disabled. Close button dismisses detail.
